articles.title: Poor oral health may contribute to declines in brain health - American Heart Association
articles.description: Research Highlights: Adults who are genetically prone to poor oral health may be more likely to show signs of declining brain health than those with healthy teeth and gums. Early treatment of poor oral health may lead to significant brain health ...
articles.content:

articles.title: Beyoncé announces 2023 Renaissance tour including 3 Canadian shows - CBC News
articles.description: Beyoncé is taking her Renaissance global. The superstar will start a world tour in Sweden this May with stops throughout Europe, Canada and the United States. Two nights in Toronto this July will kick off the North American leg of the tour.
articles.content:
